creator: Vested
descriptionHtml:
Investing in the US stock market has never been easier. With Vested, you can now invest in US stocks and ETF from India safely and legally. Zero commission*. No minimum deposit. Fractional investing.

Vested features make investing in high prices stocks such as Apple, Google, Amazon, Berkshire Hathaway, or ETF such as Vanguard's S&P500 or PowerShares Nasdaq ETF affordable.

Invest in US stocks, hassle-free
- Sign up in minutes to undergo KYC process that meets US regulations
- Remit INR to USD with one of banking partners
- Start investing in US stocks and ETFs in the US stock market, or invest in custom portfolios
- Sell and withdraw anytime
- Receive tax documents to bring to the tax authorities at the end of the tax year

Features:

Platform simplified for US stock market investing
- Designed for new and expert investors alike
- Build a custom portfolio that suits your investments need
- Invest in recommended themes, ETF, and ETFs (like mutual fund & mutual funds) that matches your risk profile
- View your portfolio, analytics, and performance of US stocks
- Get real time stock market data and updates
- Invest in stocks from different sectors (tech, real estate, telecom, healthcare, finance, electric, gas, retail, food, etc)
- Latest finance news and insights from sources such as the Financial Time, Bloomberg, and more.

Portfolio & investment tracking and analysis
- Simple to use dashboard to track portfolio value, total investment amount, and cash amount
- Analysis provided for daily returns and total returns for each stock or ETF you invest in
- Stock information include performance chart, investment data, share information, and others
- Earnings chart provided expected earnings per share (expected EPS) and actual earnings per share (actual EPS)
- Sector breakdown chart for ETF (tech, real estate, telecom, healthcare, finance, electric, gas, retail, food, etc)
- Top holdings chart for various ETF

Activity & report tracking
- Tax document to bring to the tax authorities at the end of the tax year
- Trade confirmation document to confirm that your trade has been executed
- Monthly confirmation document to provide you a summarizing all your US stocks trade for the month

We support the following banks for the remittance process:
- ICICI Bank
- Axis Bank
- Yes Bank
- HDFC Bank
- SBI - State Bank of India
- Bank of Baroda
- Punjab National Bank
- Kotak Mahindra Bank
- Citi Bank
And many others

Vested is a SEC registered investment adviser which enables you to invest in US stocks. With Vested, you can invest in the NYSE and Nasdaq (similar to BSE and NSE) in the US. You can also invest in equities similar to what you would do on Zerodha, Interactive Brokers, etc. Our mission is to enable sustainable wealth creation by enabling local investors to go global.

Disclaimer to traders: Intraday trading and other forms of trade is not available on the Vested platform.

* Other fees such as funds transfer, FX conversion or other fees may apply

- Bug fixes and performance optimizations

title: Vested: US Stocks, ETF & Stock Market Investing

creator: Vested
descriptionHtml:
Investing in the US stock market has never been easier. With Vested, you can now invest in US stocks and ETF from India safely and legally. Zero commission*. No minimum deposit. Fractional investing.

Vested features make investing in high prices stocks such as Apple, Google, Amazon, Berkshire Hathaway, or ETF such as Vanguard's S&P500 or PowerShares Nasdaq ETF affordable.

Invest in US stocks, hassle-free
- Sign up in minutes to undergo KYC process that meets US regulations
- Remit INR to USD with one of banking partners
- Start investing in US stocks and ETFs in the US stock market, or invest in custom portfolios
- Sell and withdraw anytime
- Receive tax documents to bring to the tax authorities at the end of the tax year

Features:

Platform simplified for US stock market investing
- Designed for new and expert investors alike
- Build a custom portfolio that suits your investments need
- Invest in recommended themes, ETF, and ETFs (like mutual fund & mutual funds) that matches your risk profile
- View your portfolio, analytics, and performance of US stocks
- Get real time stock market data and updates
- Invest in stocks from different sectors (tech, real estate, telecom, healthcare, finance, electric, gas, retail, food, etc)
- Latest finance news and insights from sources such as the Financial Time, Bloomberg, and more.

Portfolio & investment tracking and analysis
- Simple to use dashboard to track portfolio value, total investment amount, and cash amount
- Analysis provided for daily returns and total returns for each stock or ETF you invest in
- Stock information include performance chart, investment data, share information, and others
- Earnings chart provided expected earnings per share (expected EPS) and actual earnings per share (actual EPS)
- Sector breakdown chart for ETF (tech, real estate, telecom, healthcare, finance, electric, gas, retail, food, etc)
- Top holdings chart for various ETF

Activity & report tracking
- Tax document to bring to the tax authorities at the end of the tax year
- Trade confirmation document to confirm that your trade has been executed
- Monthly confirmation document to provide you a summarizing all your US stocks trade for the month

We support the following banks for the remittance process:
- ICICI Bank
- Axis Bank
- Yes Bank
- HDFC Bank
- SBI - State Bank of India
- Bank of Baroda
- Punjab National Bank
- Kotak Mahindra Bank
- Citi Bank

Vested features make investing in high prices stocks such as Apple, Google, Amazon, Berkshire Hathaway, or ETF such as Vanguard's S&P500 or PowerShares Nasdaq ETF affordable.

Invest in US stocks, hassle-free
- Sign up in minutes to undergo KYC process that meets US regulations
- Remit INR to USD with one of banking partners
- Start investing in US stocks and ETFs in the US stock market, or invest in custom portfolios
- Sell and withdraw anytime
- Receive tax documents to bring to the tax authorities at the end of the tax year

Features:

Platform simplified for US stock market investing
- Designed for new and expert investors alike
- Build a custom portfolio that suits your investments need
- Invest in recommended themes, ETF, and ETFs (like mutual fund & mutual funds) that matches your risk profile
- View your portfolio, analytics, and performance of US stocks
- Get real time stock market data and updates
- Invest in stocks from different sectors (tech, real estate, telecom, healthcare, finance, electric, gas, retail, food, etc)
- Latest finance news and insights from sources such as the Financial Time, Bloomberg, and more.

Portfolio & investment tracking and analysis
- Simple to use dashboard to track portfolio value, total investment amount, and cash amount
- Analysis provided for daily returns and total returns for each stock or ETF you invest in
- Stock information include performance chart, investment data, share information, and others
- Earnings chart provided expected earnings per share (expected EPS) and actual earnings per share (actual EPS)
- Sector breakdown chart for ETF (tech, real estate, telecom, healthcare, finance, electric, gas, retail, food, etc)
- Top holdings chart for various ETF

Activity & report tracking
- Tax document to bring to the tax authorities at the end of the tax year
- Trade confirmation document to confirm that your trade has been executed
- Monthly confirmation document to provide you a summarizing all your US stocks trade for the month

We support the following banks for the remittance process:
- ICICI Bank
- Axis Bank
- Yes Bank
- HDFC Bank
- SBI - State Bank of India
- Bank of Baroda
- Punjab National Bank
- Kotak Mahindra Bank
- Citi Bank
And many others

Vested is a SEC registered investment adviser which enables you to invest in US stocks. With Vested, you can invest in the NYSE and Nasdaq (similar to BSE and NSE) in the US. You can also invest in equities similar to what you would do on Zerodha, Interactive Brokers, etc. Our mission is to enable sustainable wealth creation by enabling local investors to go global.

Disclaimer to traders: Intraday trading and other forms of trade is not available on the Vested platform.

* Other fees such as funds transfer, FX conversion or other fees may apply

descriptionShort: Invest in US stocks, shares, ETFs & portfolio. Easy US stock market investing
title: Vested: US Stocks, ETF & Stock Market Investing

creator: Vested
descriptionHtml:
Investing in the US stock market has never been easier. With Vested, you can now invest in US stocks and ETF from India safely and legally. Zero commission*. No minimum deposit. Fractional investing.

Vested features make investing in high prices stocks such as Apple, Google, Amazon, Berkshire Hathaway, or ETF such as Vanguard's S&P500 or PowerShares Nasdaq ETF affordable.

Invest in US stocks, hassle-free
- Sign up in minutes to undergo KYC process that meets US regulations
- Remit INR to USD with one of banking partners
- Start investing in US stocks and ETFs in the US stock market, or invest in custom portfolios
- Sell and withdraw anytime
- Receive tax documents to bring to the tax authorities at the end of the tax year

Features:

Platform simplified for US stock market investing
- Designed for new and expert investors alike
- Build a custom portfolio that suits your investments need
- Invest in recommended themes, ETF, and ETFs (like mutual fund & mutual funds) that matches your risk profile
- View your portfolio, analytics, and performance of US stocks
- Get real time stock market data and updates
- Invest in stocks from different sectors (tech, real estate, telecom, healthcare, finance, electric, gas, retail, food, etc)
- Latest finance news and insights from sources such as the Financial Time, Bloomberg, and more.

Portfolio & investment tracking and analysis
- Simple to use dashboard to track portfolio value, total investment amount, and cash amount
- Analysis provided for daily returns and total returns for each stock or ETF you invest in
- Stock information include performance chart, investment data, share information, and others
- Earnings chart provided expected earnings per share (expected EPS) and actual earnings per share (actual EPS)
- Sector breakdown chart for ETF (tech, real estate, telecom, healthcare, finance, electric, gas, retail, food, etc)
- Top holdings chart for various ETF

Activity & report tracking
- Tax document to bring to the tax authorities at the end of the tax year
- Trade confirmation document to confirm that your trade has been executed
- Monthly confirmation document to provide you a summarizing all your US stocks trade for the month

We support the following banks for the remittance process:
- ICICI Bank
- Axis Bank
- Yes Bank
- HDFC Bank
- SBI - State Bank of India
- Bank of Baroda
- Punjab National Bank
- Kotak Mahindra Bank
- Citi Bank
And many others

title: Vested: US Stocks, ETF & Stock Market Investing

creator: Vested
descriptionHtml:
Investing in the US stock market has never been easier. With Vested, you can now invest in US stocks and ETF from India safely and legally. Zero commission*. No minimum deposit. Fractional investing.

Vested features make investing in high prices stocks such as Apple, Google, Amazon, Berkshire Hathaway, or ETF such as Vanguard's S&P500 or PowerShares Nasdaq ETF affordable.

Invest in US stocks, hassle-free
- Sign up in minutes to undergo KYC process that meets US regulations
- Remit INR to USD with one of banking partners
- Start investing in US stocks and ETFs in the US stock market, or invest in custom portfolios
- Sell and withdraw anytime
- Receive tax documents to bring to the tax authorities at the end of the tax year

Features:

Platform simplified for US stock market investing
- Designed for new and expert investors alike
- Build a custom portfolio that suits your investments need
- Invest in recommended themes, ETF, and ETFs (like mutual fund & mutual funds) that matches your risk profile
- View your portfolio, analytics, and performance of US stocks
- Get real time stock market data and updates
- Invest in stocks from different sectors (tech, real estate, telecom, healthcare, finance, electric, gas, retail, food, etc)
- Latest finance news and insights from sources such as the Financial Time, Bloomberg, and more.

Portfolio & investment tracking and analysis
- Simple to use dashboard to track portfolio value, total investment amount, and cash amount
- Analysis provided for daily returns and total returns for each stock or ETF you invest in
- Stock information include performance chart, investment data, share information, and others
- Earnings chart provided expected earnings per share (expected EPS) and actual earnings per share (actual EPS)
- Sector breakdown chart for ETF (tech, real estate, telecom, healthcare, finance, electric, gas, retail, food, etc)
- Top holdings chart for various ETF

Activity & report tracking
- Tax document to bring to the tax authorities at the end of the tax year
- Trade confirmation document to confirm that your trade has been executed
- Monthly confirmation document to provide you a summarizing all your US stocks trade for the month

We support the following banks for the remittance process:
- ICICI Bank
- Axis Bank
- Yes Bank
- HDFC Bank
- SBI - State Bank of India
- Bank of Baroda
- Punjab National Bank
- Kotak Mahindra Bank
- Citi Bank
And many others

creator: Vested
descriptionHtml:
Investing in the US stock market has never been easier. With Vested, you can now invest in US stocks and ETF from India safely and legally. Zero commission*. No minimum deposit. Fractional investing.

Vested features make investing in high prices stocks such as Apple, Google, Amazon, Berkshire Hathaway, or ETF such as Vanguard's S&P500 or PowerShares Nasdaq ETF affordable.

Invest in US stocks, hassle-free
- Sign up in minutes to undergo KYC process that meets US regulations
- Remit INR to USD with one of banking partners
- Start investing in US stocks and ETFs in the US stock market, or invest in custom portfolios
- Sell and withdraw anytime
- Receive tax documents to bring to the tax authorities at the end of the tax year

Features:

Platform simplified for US stock market investing
- Designed for new and expert investors alike
- Build a custom portfolio that suits your investments need
- Invest in recommended themes, ETF, and ETFs (like mutual fund & mutual funds) that matches your risk profile
- View your portfolio, analytics, and performance of US stocks
- Get real time stock market data and updates
- Invest in stocks from different sectors (tech, real estate, telecom, healthcare, finance, electric, gas, retail, food, etc)
- Latest finance news and insights from sources such as the Financial Time, Bloomberg, and more.

Portfolio & investment tracking and analysis
- Simple to use dashboard to track portfolio value, total investment amount, and cash amount
- Analysis provided for daily returns and total returns for each stock or ETF you invest in
- Stock information include performance chart, investment data, share information, and others
- Earnings chart provided expected earnings per share (expected EPS) and actual earnings per share (actual EPS)
- Sector breakdown chart for ETF (tech, real estate, telecom, healthcare, finance, electric, gas, retail, food, etc)
- Top holdings chart for various ETF

Activity & report tracking
- Tax document to bring to the tax authorities at the end of the tax year
- Trade confirmation document to confirm that your trade has been executed
- Monthly confirmation document to provide you a summarizing all your US stocks trade for the month

We support the following banks for the remittance process:
- ICICI Bank
- Axis Bank
- Yes Bank
- HDFC Bank
- SBI - State Bank of India
- Bank of Baroda
- Punjab National Bank
- Kotak Mahindra Bank
- Citi Bank
And many others

Vested is a SEC registered investment adviser which enables you to invest in US stocks. With Vested, you can invest in the NYSE and Nasdaq (similar to BSE and NSE) in the US. You can also invest in equities similar to what you would do on Zerodha, Interactive Brokers, etc. Our mission is to enable sustainable wealth creation by enabling local investors to go global.

Disclaimer to traders: Intraday trading and other forms of trade is not available on the Vested platform.

* Other fees such as funds transfer, FX conversion or other fees may apply

Platform simplified for US stock market investing

title:
Vested: US Stocks & ETFs
5.66

creator: Vested
descriptionHtml:
Vested: Alternative Investments Made Easy
🌟Invest in US Stocks & ETFs from India
🌟SIP in US Stocks & ETFs
🌟Invest in P2P Lending
🌟Invest in INR Bonds
🌟Invest in Solar Projects

🚀Invest in the US Stock Markets hassle-free
At Vested, we are here to help you buy US Stocks and ETFs easily and legally.
- Sign up and complete the fully digital KYC to open your US Stocks account within minutes
- Remit INR to USD from your local bank account to your US investing account
- Invest in high-priced US stocks such as Tesla, Apple, Google, Amazon, Microsoft, and Berkshire Hathaway, among others, or buy US ETFs such as Vanguard's S&P 500 or PowerShares Nasdaq ETF, among others, starting with just $1.
- Invest in direct US Stocks or invest in custom portfolios with Vests
- Sell and withdraw anytime
- Receive tax documents to bring to the tax authorities at the end of the tax year
- Invest in stocks from different sectors (tech, real estate, telecom, healthcare, finance, electric, gas, retail, food, etc.)

🚀Invest in peer-to-peer (P2P) Lending with Vested Edge
- Edge lowers your investment risk in P2P Lending by distributing your investment automatically across multiple RBI-registered P2P NBFCs and further across multiple qualified borrowers. Exposure to a single borrower is less than 0.25%
- Earn up to 11.5% fixed returns
- Start with just ₹20,000
- Partnered with two leading P2P companies - Faircent & Lendbox
- Vested Academy: In-depth collection of educational lessons on P2P Lending

🚀Invest in Corporate Bonds and Government Securities
- Invest in curated bonds rated A & above. Issued by top-rated companies
- Fixed returns up to 12% that beat inflation
- Start with just ₹10,000
- Flexible tenures of 6-60 months
- Seamless redemption directly in your bank account
- 100% digital instant KYC
- Bonds credited to your DEMAT account

🚀Earn income while helping India move to clean energy
- Buy solar panels in rooftop solar projects. You will be the proud owner of a physical solar panel that is installed on a rooftop.
- Earn 10-13% returns from electricity your panels generate
- Investment in a physical asset fully digitally
- Receive daily & monthly performance updates on your solar panels
- Start with just ₹25,000

🔥Why should Vested be your preferred alternative investment app?
Build a multi-asset portfolio beyond Indian Stocks, Fixed Deposits and Physical Gold
- Diversify into global and Indian markets and build a robust alternative investment portfolio
- Trusted platform where your investments are safe
- View your portfolio, analytics, and performance

🗞️Get US stock market news and analysis:
- Stay up-to-date with the changing US markets with our bite-sized summaries: Vested Shorts
- Two US stock deep-dives every month, published every other Wednesday
- Get real-time stock market data and updates for 5,000+ stocks and ETFs
- Access to fundamental data, charting tools, and live pricing to make your tracking and investing decisions easier

Vested Finance works with a registered US Stock Broker Dealer, Drivewealth, to bring you US stocks and US ETFs. We support all major banks for the remittance process - ICICI, Axis, HDFC, SBI, Citi, and many others.

Vested Finance Inc. is an investment adviser registered with the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). Registration of an investment adviser does not imply any specific level of skill or training and does not constitute an endorsement of the firm by the Commission. All securities are offered through VF Securities, Inc. (a member of FINRA/SIPC). With Vested, you can invest in the NYSE and Nasdaq.

Disclaimer to traders: Intraday trading, margins, and derivative products are not available on the Vested platform.

*Other fees such as funds transfer, FX conversion, or other fees may apply
descriptionShort: Vested is an alternative investment App for US Stocks,P2P Lending, Bonds & Solar

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Diversify your portfolio into more alternative investments with Vested Edge, and other exciting assets coming soon. We've also upgraded the app with performance improvements and bug fixes for a better experience.
